ModMetaData.name: Deep Resource Manager
ModMetaData.author: Marvun
ModMetaData.description:
A comprehensive mod that displays all discovered deep resources in an organized table with advanced filtering and drill management.
Features: - View all discovered deep resources in a detailed table - Filter by resource type (with persistent settings) - See active drills and their status (idle, working, no power) - Manage drill permissions (allowed/forbidden) - Track mineable amounts per deposit and per drill - Expandable drill details showing progress and status - Click to jump to deposits and drills - Supports both standard deep resources and treasure mod resources
